title: Do anyone ID this Font?
author: AlandeRoo

comments.content:
A Linotype typeface designed in 1990 by Peter Matthias Noordzij (PMN), and named for his wife, Caecilia. Available from Linotype as [PMN Caecilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102414/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/pmn-caecilia/) and from Adobe also as [PMN Caecilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102414/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/pmn-caecilia/).  
Don
